description: The Warehouse Associate prepares merchandise for sale in the Getty stores, organizes merchandise and supplies in the warehouse and warehouse annexes, and supports the Getty stores.
responsibilities: Receives merchandise into inventory system, ensuring that merchandise is in sellable condition and that quantities and costs are correct. Shelves merchandise according to warehouse procedures. Performs administrative duties: organize and file purchase orders, invoices, receiving reports, and transfers; process mail; update vendor list. Pulls restock of merchandise sold in the stores to replenish sales floor. Packages and ships customer orders purchased in-store or via phone.

qualifications.required: High school/GED, 1-2 years experience in warehouse environment, Driver's license

skills: Must be able to operate a computerized integrated POS/inventory system
Training for forklift and pallet jack operation may be required and provided
May need to operate a 2-axle box truck
Ability to understand and implement policies and procedures
Knowledge of institution's health and safety practices
Must be able to lift up to 40lbs from the floor
benefits: Medical, Dental and Vision insurance coverage, starting on date of hire. Getty pays 75%-95% of the premium, depending on the plan selected. 403(b) Employee Investment retirement plan – with up to 5% Getty Match. Getty contribution of 6%, on behalf of employee, to 401(a) retirement account. Educational Assistance and professional development. Paid Vacation, Sick and Personal Days. 12 Paid Holidays. Many positions have bi-weekly Off-Fridays. On-Site Fitness Center at Getty Center. Community service opportunities.
